bullets.text: Designed, developed, and maintained university websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress.
Collaborated with campus committees and departments to ensure the website reflected the universityâ€™s strategic vision, mission, and branding.
Led UI/UX design initiatives by creating wireframes and user flows to optimize user experiences across platforms.
Promoted consistent branding by standardizing templates, image archives, and formatting practices across university web properties.
Photoshopped over 20 images from clients to accommodate website templates.
QA tested websites to ensure ADA-compliant standards.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed Elon Musk's tweets from 11/26 to 12/03 to determine sentiment trends using vaderSentiment for natural language processing.

projects.name: IoT Wearable and iOS App for Tracking Basal Body Temperature
projects.description: Designed a cost-effective IoT wearable device paired with an iOS app to support menstrual cycle tracking via basal body temperature.

projects.name: Product Recommendation Web App
projects.description: Created a RESTful web app similar to LinkTree/Amazon Storefront that allows users to build profiles and share affiliate product links.

projects.name: Clearinghouse Simulator
projects.description: Developed a financial transaction management simulator using AWS services with support for processing transactions via function URLs.
